item.title: Self hosted online collaborative drawing platform Excalidraw
item.description: First of all, I’d like to thank my in-laws for taking the baby for summer vacation, so I can have a weekend to develop this system. Also thanks to my wife, I did my own thing for two days during the weekend and didn’t criticize me. Lastly, I would like to thank the company for the team building, providing a hotel to stay and spending a night to fix the Chinese handwriting.
